entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Vaughan

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
